Title: TFS Helper
Description:
TFS Helper is a module based utility to accomplish tasks and create reports which are not provided by TFS out of the box.
It is coded in vb.net

It currently has a few reports.
1-Work Item File History
The purpose of this module is to find to total effect a work item had on source files
2-Work Item Field History
The purpose of this module is to give work item history at field resolution
3-File work item history
The purpose of this module is to find the list of work items that participated in the construction of a source file

Further help text can be found on program forms.
